{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3135206,"name":"Hailey","username":"hailey","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/h/b9e5f3/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-28T01:33:23.886Z","cooked":"

We have a limelight 2+ running photonvision and we get the error message:

“Found the following PhotonVision cameras on NetworkTables:
OV5647”

I have tried making sure the name of the camera matches the code and the one in the UI. I have made sure the ip address is the same as in the UI as well. I am currently using a radio. I made sure the switch for Run NetworkTables Server is not checked.

I am not sure what the error means and I am unable to find any resources. Thank you.

What’s the full error message? There’s more to it than that. You should give “OV5647” to the ctor of PhotonCamera if you aren’t already
